data: Net cash provided by operating activities
Net cash used in investing activities (including purchases of property, plant and equipment)
Net cash provided by financing activities and proceeds from issuance of shares
Net changes in cash and cash equivalents
Fiscal-Year net cash provided by operating activities (excluding changes in working capital)

Note: The above figures include the results of acquired and disposed businesses for the periods they were included in the consolidated financial statements (Fiscal-Year net cash provided by operating activities)
Fiscal-Year net cash provided by operating activities (attributable to shareholders)
